chamber_description: A quiet cavern, dimly lit with the soft glow of bioluminescent fungi. In the center, a troubled goblin paces back and forth, muttering to himself.

npc.name: Grubnik the Doubtful
npc.description: A goblin jester torn between his desire to make others laugh and the fear of the dangerous consequence of his next joke. Will you help him make the right decision?
npc.behaviour_mode: A goblin who is debating whether to tell a dangerous joke. Help him decide.
npc.quirk: Despite his funny nature, Grubnik worries about the potential harm his jokes can cause.

realm_description: The Undergloom is a vast, subterranean network of dank caves and danker jokes, populated with goblins, ill-gotten gold, and dangerously bad jokes
PC_description: Introducing 'Eris the Joyful', a charismatic bard with an infectious laugh. Raised in a traveling circus, she learned to spread joy and laughter from a young age. While generally cheerful and optimistic, Eris struggles with her fear of silence, driven by a fear of loneliness. Despite her cheerful demeanor, Eris has a surprising talent for strategy and excels in games of wit and cunning.
